==Scientific perspectives==
    −
For the last 30 years, the scientific research literature has been formally addressing the topic of ‘Wisdom’, especially as Western economies begin to transition from a Manufacturing & Industry Age model into a Science & Technology Information Age model.
+
For the last 30 years, the scientific research literature has been formally addressing the topic of ‘'''W'''isdom’, especially as Western economies begin to transition from a Manufacturing & Industry Age model into a Science & Technology Information Age model.
     
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, as viewed as an integral component of the ‘'''D'''ata’ to ‘'''I'''nformation’ to ‘'''K'''nowledge’ learning pathway.
